archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.2.5e: e) browser-based application testing, which includes rigorous review of external content, such as Web 2.0 content provided by external websites (e.g. targeted advertising, digital maps and videos).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
